Traits.Name: Ambush
Traits.Description: Attacks that break stealth gain true strike and deal boosted damage.

Traits.Name: Chameleonic
Traits.Description: When ending its turn adjacent to cover, gains stealth

Interrupts.Name: Decoy
Interrupts.Description: When hit by an attack, turns that hit into a miss and teleports 3 spaces to an unoccupied space it can see, which is its ‘real’ location.
